front.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Ethernet - Amendment: Enhancements to the MAC Merge function and the Time Synchronization Service Interface (TSSI) to Include Point-to-Point 10 Mb/s Single Pair Ethernet
front.abstract: This amendment to IEEE Std 802.3-202x specifies additions to and appropriate modifications of the IEEE Std 802.3 MAC Merge sublayer and the Time Synchronization Service Interface (TSSI) to support 10 Mb/s Single-Pair Ethernet point to point PHYs.
